attributes.action: make representations against European interference and continue to allow vehicles to tow other vehicles using an 'A Frame system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: New Construction and Use regulations are being discussed by the European beaureaucrats which will outlaw the towing of a vehilce using the braked A frame system. This system is far more efficient and environmentally friendly that any other method of towing.  How can they diferentiate between towing a car and a trailer both of which are on a braked system?  More unwanted interference restricting English right to freedom of choice.
